tool_description: Calculates total micronutrients (vitamins and minerals) for a complete recipe based on individual ingredient profiles and quantities.

quantities_g.description: Quantities in grams for each ingredient

vitamin_a_mcg.description: Vitamin A content per 100g for each ingredient

vitamin_c_mg.description: Vitamin C content per 100g for each ingredient

calcium_mg.description: Calcium content per 100g for each ingredient

iron_mg.description: Iron content per 100g for each ingredient

potassium_mg.description: Potassium content per 100g for each ingredient

sodium_mg.description: Sodium content per 100g for each ingredient

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All micronutrient arrays must have the same length as ingredient_names array.
Invalid micronutrient values: All micronutrient values must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid quantities: All ingredient quantities must be positive numbers greater than 0.
Maximum ingredients exceeded: Recipe cannot contain more than 50 ingredients for calculation.
Empty ingredient list: At least one ingredient must be provided for calculation.
usage: Provide ingredient_names, quantities_g, and micronutrient content per 100g for each ingredient. Returns total vitamin and mineral content for the entire recipe.
